articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il published 
    Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Famous works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were brought out in different countries.
 A total of 4,850 volumes of Kim Il Sung's works "For The Complete Victory Of Socialism", "On The Three Principles Of National Reunification", "Answers To Questions Raised By a Delegation of Journalists of Washington Times from the United States", vols. 2, 3 and 4 of part 1 anti-Japanese revolution of his reminiscences "With the Century" and others were brought out in 8 languages in Cuba, Peru, Trinidad and Tobago, Nepal, Bulgaria, India and other countries on  the occasion of the first day of the sun in 21st century.    
 Meanwhile, a total of 3,500 volumes of Kim Jong Il's works including "Let Us Give Fuller Play To Advantages Of Our People's Power", "on preserving the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction" and "Socialism Is a Science" were published in 5 languages in Russia, Mexico, Italy, Iran and Germany.
